name: Twilly d'Hermu00e8s Eau de Parfum Travel Spray
about: Fragrance Family:Floral.Scent Type:Powdery Florals.Key Notes:Ginger, Tuberose, Sandalwood.About:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzyl Salicylate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Bht, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonene, Coumarin, Citral, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol, Farnesol, Isoeugenol, Disodium Edta.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of my favorite perfumes so far. it's fresh and sweet and seductive. you can wear it during the day or at night time or a date. it does last quite a long time and it stays on your clothes as well. I tried it in the store, and at first, I didn't like it, but as it settled in, I loved it. I ended up leaving the store with it.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my collection; a must try for everyone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good quality is last long plus travel size. I carry in different bags! Thank you ud83dude0a

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Parfum. It smells rich, but not overwhelming. When I run out of this travel spray, I will more than likely buy a regular sized bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very much like pencil shavings. Probably will give away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Scent does not last. You get an hour out of this but it is a lovely fragrance and well packaged.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so sexy and sultry. It's the perfect fall / winter fragrance. I have been thru a few bottles of this and I will keep buying this because it's just smells so gorg on the body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good lord, I love this perfume. Itu2019s powdery and feminine without being sweet, and itu2019s long-lasting without being overpowering. I put this on in the morning and Iu2019m transported on a delicate French cloud to a corner bistro where the wine flows like beer and the fashionistas flock like the salmon of Capistrano. A beret pops out of my hair and my high school French starts to sound like Iu2019m Chanel herself. I will never wear anything else again.   All of this is intense hyperbole, I know, but I really canu2019t get over how much I love this stuff. Itu2019s truly the best.
The perfect scent in the perfect size! Love. Love. Love.
